interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Water Wave Human Hair Bundles With Closure 12 14 16+10 Brazilian Virgin Wet and Wavy Human Hair 3 Bundles With Free Part Lace Closure Natural Black 70g/bundle(12/14/16+10)
Review Date: 2020/12/10
Store: Jiumido
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Jiumido', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Installation Type': 'Weave', 'Package Dimensions': '10.08 x 6.14 x 2.17 inches; 14.96 Ounces'}
Review Text: Nice until you actually wash and put it in your hair. It sheds too much and has no weight to it in other words it thins out so much you can barely see the ends it doesn't look right. Other wet n wavy hair has a nice bounce and doesn't shed or become frizzy once washed.
Review Title: Good for short term use only
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference**: The user continues to prefer tape-in hair extensions for temporary installation but remains increasingly frustrated with adhesive performance. Recent experimentation with weave products has led to further dissatisfaction due to quality issues.
  
- **Material Preference**: While the user consistently favors human hair for a natural look, their recent experiences with wavy textures have made them more cautious and discerning when it comes to quality.
  
- **Quality Focus**: Recent purchases have been disappointing, particularly regarding thickness and adherence. The user's experiences with excessive shedding and poor performance have heightened their need for reliable, high-quality products.
  
- **Length Specification**: Although typically favoring longer extensions, the user's openness to shorter lengths is influenced by quality and thickness considerations following negative experiences with thinning hair.
  
- **Installation Method**: The user values the simplicity of tape-in extensions but has experienced growing frustration with the effectiveness of adhesives, prompting a reassessment of alternatives.
  
- **Dissatisfaction with Thickness**: Concerns about volume persist, especially after encountering products that lack density and shed excessively, diminishing the natural look and blend of their hair.

Overall, the user is focused on finding premium-quality extensions that deliver both volume and durability, actively exploring options that meet their standards in light of their recent unsatisfactory experiences.
